0.7.name: wordpress/ps-wp-multi-domain
0.7.description:
This plugin rewrite "wp-config.php" to enable access multiple domain. It will be great help to link check of your WordPress site or mirroring for test.

Functions

  • Rewrite "wp-config.php" automatilally.
  • Enable multi domain access on demand.

Version History

  • 0.8.0
    • Public release
